flowers.name: Whispers of the Rose
flowers.description: Beautiful roses, whispering love and passion in every petal.

flowers.name: Golden Glow of the Tulip
flowers.description: A vibrant yellow tulip, radiating warmth and sunshine in a single bloom.

flowers.name: Sun’s Embrace
flowers.description: A bright sunflower that follows the sun, basking in its golden embrace.

flowers.name: Pure Grace of the Daisy
flowers.description: A delicate white daisy, symbolizing purity and simplicity in every petal.

flowers.name: Orchid’s Elegance
flowers.description: An exotic purple orchid, a symbol of beauty and grace that never fades.

flowers.name: Sun’s Radiance
flowers.description: A bright sunflower, basking in the sunlight, always reaching for the sky.

flowers.name: Daisy’s Dream
flowers.description: A delicate white daisy, gentle and serene, perfect for moments of quiet reflection.

flowers.name: Orchid’s Secret
flowers.description: An exotic purple orchid, unfolding its beauty like a hidden secret waiting to be discovered.

flowers.name: Majestic Orchid
flowers.description: An exotic purple orchid, a royal bloom that stands out in elegance and charm.
